00039 #ifndef __CVMX_PKO_H__
00040 #define __CVMX_PKO_H__
00041 
00042 #include "cvmx-hwpko.h"
00043 
00044 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00045 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00046 extern "C" {
00047 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00048 #endif
00049 
00050 /**
00051  * @INTERNAL
00052  *
00053  * Backward compatibility for packet transmission using legacy PKO command.
00054  *
00055  */
00056 extern cvmx_pko_return_value_t cvmx_pko3_legacy_xmit(unsigned dq,
00057     cvmx_pko_command_word0_t pko_command,
00058     cvmx_buf_ptr_t packet, uint64_t addr, bool tag_sw);
00059 
00060 /**
00061  * Complete packet output. cvmx_pko_send_packet_prepare() must be called exactly once before this,
00062  * and the same parameters must be passed to both cvmx_pko_send_packet_prepare() and
00063  * cvmx_pko_send_packet_finish().
00064  *
00065  * WARNING: This function may have to look up the proper PKO port in
00066  * the IPD port to PKO port map, and is thus slower than calling
00067  * cvmx_pko_send_packet_finish_pkoid() directly if the PKO port
00068  * identifier is known.
00069  *
00070  * @param ipd_port   The IPD port corresponding the to pko port the packet is for
00071  * @param queue  Queue to use
00072  * @param pko_command
00073  *               PKO HW command word
00074  * @param packet Packet to send
00075  * @param use_locking
00076  *               CVMX_PKO_LOCK_NONE, CVMX_PKO_LOCK_ATOMIC_TAG, or CVMX_PKO_LOCK_CMD_QUEUE
00077  *
00078  * @return returns CVMX_PKO_SUCCESS on success, or error code on failure of output
00079  */
00080 static inline cvmx_pko_return_value_t cvmx_pko_send_packet_finish(uint64_t ipd_port, uint64_t queue,
00081                                 cvmx_pko_command_word0_t pko_command, cvmx_buf_ptr_t packet, cvmx_pko_lock_t use_locking)
00082 {
00083     cvmx_cmd_queue_result_t result;
00084 
00085     if (octeon_has_feature(OCTEON_FEATURE_CN78XX_WQE)) {
00086         return cvmx_pko3_legacy_xmit( queue, pko_command, packet, 0,
00087             use_locking == CVMX_PKO_LOCK_ATOMIC_TAG);
00088     }
00089 
00090     if (use_locking == CVMX_PKO_LOCK_ATOMIC_TAG)
00091         cvmx_pow_tag_sw_wait();
00092 
00093     result = cvmx_cmd_queue_write2(CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_PKO(queue), (use_locking == CVMX_PKO_LOCK_CMD_QUEUE), pko_command.u64, packet.u64);
00094     if (cvmx_likely(result == CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_SUCCESS)) {
00095         cvmx_pko_doorbell(ipd_port, queue, 2);
00096         return CVMX_PKO_SUCCESS;
00097     } else if ((result == CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_NO_MEMORY) || (result == CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_FULL)) {
00098         return CVMX_PKO_NO_MEMORY;
00099     } else {
00100         return CVMX_PKO_INVALID_QUEUE;
00101     }
00102 }
00103 
00104 /**
00105  * Complete packet output. cvmx_pko_send_packet_prepare() must be called exactly once before this,
00106  * and the same parameters must be passed to both cvmx_pko_send_packet_prepare() and
00107  * cvmx_pko_send_packet_finish().
00108  *
00109  * WARNING: This function may have to look up the proper PKO port in
00110  * the IPD port to PKO port map, and is thus slower than calling
00111  * cvmx_pko_send_packet_finish3_pkoid() directly if the PKO port
00112  * identifier is known.
00113  *
00114  * @param ipd_port   The IPD port corresponding the to pko port the packet is for
00115  * @param queue  Queue to use
00116  * @param pko_command
00117  *               PKO HW command word
00118  * @param packet Packet to send
00119  * @param addr   Plysical address of a work queue entry or physical address to zero on complete.
00120  * @param use_locking
00121  *               CVMX_PKO_LOCK_NONE, CVMX_PKO_LOCK_ATOMIC_TAG, or CVMX_PKO_LOCK_CMD_QUEUE
00122  *
00123  * @return returns CVMX_PKO_SUCCESS on success, or error code on failure of output
00124  */
00125 static inline cvmx_pko_return_value_t cvmx_pko_send_packet_finish3(uint64_t ipd_port, uint64_t queue,
00126                                  cvmx_pko_command_word0_t pko_command, cvmx_buf_ptr_t packet, uint64_t addr, cvmx_pko_lock_t use_locking)
00127 {
00128     cvmx_cmd_queue_result_t result;
00129 
00130     if (octeon_has_feature(OCTEON_FEATURE_CN78XX_WQE)) {
00131         return cvmx_pko3_legacy_xmit( queue, pko_command, packet, addr,
00132             use_locking == CVMX_PKO_LOCK_ATOMIC_TAG);
00133     }
00134 
00135     if (use_locking == CVMX_PKO_LOCK_ATOMIC_TAG)
00136         cvmx_pow_tag_sw_wait();
00137 
00138     result = cvmx_cmd_queue_write3(CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_PKO(queue), (use_locking == CVMX_PKO_LOCK_CMD_QUEUE), pko_command.u64, packet.u64, addr);
00139     if (cvmx_likely(result == CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_SUCCESS)) {
00140         cvmx_pko_doorbell(ipd_port, queue, 3);
00141         return CVMX_PKO_SUCCESS;
00142     } else if ((result == CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_NO_MEMORY) || (result == CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_FULL)) {
00143         return CVMX_PKO_NO_MEMORY;
00144     } else {
00145         return CVMX_PKO_INVALID_QUEUE;
00146     }
00147 }
00148 /**
00149  * Complete packet output. cvmx_pko_send_packet_prepare() must be called exactly once before this,
00150  * and the same parameters must be passed to both cvmx_pko_send_packet_prepare() and
00151  * cvmx_pko_send_packet_finish_pkoid().
00152  *
00153  * @param pko_port   Port to send it on
00154  * @param queue  Queue to use
00155  * @param pko_command
00156  *               PKO HW command word
00157  * @param packet Packet to send
00158  * @param use_locking
00159  *               CVMX_PKO_LOCK_NONE, CVMX_PKO_LOCK_ATOMIC_TAG, or CVMX_PKO_LOCK_CMD_QUEUE
00160  *
00161  * @return returns CVMX_PKO_SUCCESS on success, or error code on failure of output
00162  */
00163 static inline cvmx_pko_return_value_t cvmx_pko_send_packet_finish_pkoid(int pko_port, uint64_t queue,
00164                                   cvmx_pko_command_word0_t pko_command, cvmx_buf_ptr_t packet, cvmx_pko_lock_t use_locking)
00165 {
00166     cvmx_cmd_queue_result_t result;
00167 
00168     if (octeon_has_feature(OCTEON_FEATURE_CN78XX_WQE)) {
00169         return cvmx_pko3_legacy_xmit( queue, pko_command, packet, 0,
00170             use_locking == CVMX_PKO_LOCK_ATOMIC_TAG);
00171     }
00172 
00173     if (use_locking == CVMX_PKO_LOCK_ATOMIC_TAG)
00174         cvmx_pow_tag_sw_wait();
00175     result = cvmx_cmd_queue_write2(CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_PKO(queue), (use_locking == CVMX_PKO_LOCK_CMD_QUEUE), pko_command.u64, packet.u64);
00176     if (cvmx_likely(result == CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_SUCCESS)) {
00177         cvmx_pko_doorbell_pkoid(pko_port, queue, 2);
00178         return CVMX_PKO_SUCCESS;
00179     } else if ((result == CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_NO_MEMORY) || (result == CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_FULL)) {
00180         return CVMX_PKO_NO_MEMORY;
00181     } else {
00182         return CVMX_PKO_INVALID_QUEUE;
00183     }
00184 }
00185 
00186 /**
00187  * Complete packet output. cvmx_pko_send_packet_prepare() must be called exactly once before this,
00188  * and the same parameters must be passed to both cvmx_pko_send_packet_prepare() and
00189  * cvmx_pko_send_packet_finish_pkoid().
00190  *
00191  * @param pko_port   The PKO port the packet is for
00192  * @param queue  Queue to use
00193  * @param pko_command
00194  *               PKO HW command word
00195  * @param packet Packet to send
00196  * @param addr   Plysical address of a work queue entry or physical address to zero on complete.
00197  * @param use_locking
00198  *               CVMX_PKO_LOCK_NONE, CVMX_PKO_LOCK_ATOMIC_TAG, or CVMX_PKO_LOCK_CMD_QUEUE
00199  *
00200  * @return returns CVMX_PKO_SUCCESS on success, or error code on failure of output
00201  */
00202 static inline cvmx_pko_return_value_t cvmx_pko_send_packet_finish3_pkoid(uint64_t pko_port, uint64_t queue,
00203                                    cvmx_pko_command_word0_t pko_command, cvmx_buf_ptr_t packet, uint64_t addr, cvmx_pko_lock_t use_locking)
00204 {
00205     cvmx_cmd_queue_result_t result;
00206 
00207     if (octeon_has_feature(OCTEON_FEATURE_CN78XX_WQE)) {
00208         return cvmx_pko3_legacy_xmit( queue, pko_command, packet, addr,
00209             use_locking == CVMX_PKO_LOCK_ATOMIC_TAG);
00210     }
00211 
00212     if (use_locking == CVMX_PKO_LOCK_ATOMIC_TAG)
00213         cvmx_pow_tag_sw_wait();
00214     result = cvmx_cmd_queue_write3(CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_PKO(queue), (use_locking == CVMX_PKO_LOCK_CMD_QUEUE), pko_command.u64, packet.u64, addr);
00215     if (cvmx_likely(result == CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_SUCCESS)) {
00216         cvmx_pko_doorbell_pkoid(pko_port, queue, 3);
00217         return CVMX_PKO_SUCCESS;
00218     } else if ((result == CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_NO_MEMORY) || (result == CVMX_CMD_QUEUE_FULL)) {
00219         return CVMX_PKO_NO_MEMORY;
00220     } else {
00221         return CVMX_PKO_INVALID_QUEUE;
00222     }
00223 }
